channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Philips Hue’s Festavia string lights are nearly $60 off (and still available) for Black Friday
item.description: If you want your house to be the one everyone slows down to look at this holiday season, Philips Hue’s Festavia lights can make that happen. They aren’t cheap, but thanks to an ongoing Black Friday sale at Amazon, you can still grab a 65-foot string for $145.19 (about $97 off) or a lengthier 130-foot […]

item.title: Le Black Friday fait fermer son clapet au Motorola razr 60 Ultra avec -450 € sur ce concurrent du Galaxy Z Flip 7
item.description: Le Motorola razr 60 Ultra est un smartphone à clapet que vous retrouvez à 849,99 euros au lieu de 1 299,99 euros pour le Black Friday sur Amazon.

item.title: The 192 best Black Friday deals you can still shop — a ton of tech is over half off
item.description: Now that the Thanksgiving dishes are put away and the last slice of pie is hidden in the back of the fridge, it’s time to turn your attention to the next major holiday: Black Friday. The biggest shopping day of the year has started, and as expected, there are tens of thousands of deals staring […]

item.title: VC Kara Nortman bet early on women’s sports, and now she’s creating the market
item.description: As women's sports enters what feels like a sustained boom period -- the Golden State Valkyries just played their first WNBA next season, the NWSL is expanding, media rights deals are growing -- Nortman remains cautiously optimistic about whether this moment will prove different from past surges in interest.

item.title: Forget Amazon, HyperX is running a huge $109 discount on the QuadCast 2 S
item.description: Save more when you buy the HyperX QuadCast 2 S in a bundle

item.title: The Verge’s guide to Black Friday 2025
item.description: Now that we’ve already gathered with friends and family to dine on our favorite foods, the real feast has begun. I’m talking, of course, about Black Friday and the full weekend of shopping that leads into Cyber Monday on December 1st. Many of the gadgets we recommend to readers have received steep discounts that’ll likely […]

item.title: This Sharge 3-in-1 Power Bank, the best-looking battery I've tested, is on sale for Black Friday
item.description: This Sharge 3-in-1 retractable power bank isn't just the most stylish battery pack I've tested; it boasts a fantastic feature set, including built-in wall prongs, and is discounted for Black Friday.
